Package researchsim.map

Class Tile

  • Object
    • Tile
  • public class Tile
extends Object
    A tile on the scenario map that entities' items operate on.
    A suite of tests for this class were implemented in assignment 1
    Partially implemented in assignment 1, to be completed in assignment 2

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Tile​(TileType type)
      Creates a new tile with a given type.

      • hasContents

        public boolean hasContents()
        Checks if the tile is currently occupied.
        Returns:
        true if occupied (has contents), else false
        Implemented in assignment 1

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Returns the hash code of this tile.

        Two tiles that are equal according to the equals(Object) method should have the same hash code.

        Overrides:
        hashCode in class Object
        Returns:
        hash code of this tile.
        Implement this for assignment 2

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(Object other)
        Returns true if and only if this tile is equal to the other given tile.

        For two tiles to be equal, they must have the same inhabitant and tile type.

        Overrides:
        equals in class Object
        Parameters:
        other - the reference object with which to compare
        Returns:
        true if this tile is the same as the other argument; false otherwise
        Implement this for assignment 2
